item.title: Functions in Python
item.description: Being able to use functions is an essential tool in coding. Functions allow you to perform the same set of code over and over again. This helps save time by applying the same task in various situations. Functions often use iteration and conditionals to be able to perform the desired task. import numpy as np Iteration: for and while loops are used to continually perform a set of code for a particular amount of times or while a particular statement is true
